sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Official United States Flag Act.

sections.heading: Flying the United States flag at public facilities
sections.text: Each agency of the State government and each unit of local government shall ensure that each United States flag that is flown at each building, structure, or facility that is owned or occupied entirely by the agency of the State government or unit
